segments.text: I can't believe how much water is overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to balance on the stool, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting for her share, her eyes fixed on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's quite amusing how the children are sneaking cookies right behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool looks like it could tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't make too much of a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focus on the plate is almost comical given the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
